demos.title: Personagen
demos.description: Generates synthetic audience based on profiles to test marketing campaigns and run surveys.

demos.title: Topic Trends
demos.description: Tracks trends in arXiv paper topics over time using LLMs.

demos.title: AEvolution
demos.description: A web-based tool for analyzing medical documents to identify adverse events, related medications, and relevant research articles.

demos.title: Podcastgen
demos.description: Generates podcast transcripts and audio from any document or content using LLMs.

demos.title: Entity Extractor
demos.description: Extracts entities from any document or content using LLMs.

demos.title: Video Chat
demos.description: Streamlines extraction of key insights from lengthy video transcripts via a conversational interface, enabling rapid retrieval of tutorial highlights or expert insights without manual review.

demos.title: GeoFinder
demos.description: Enables natural-language geographic queries with interactive map views, helping executives visualize location-based data and make informed decisions on markets, logistics, or site planning.

demos.title: K12 Video Analysis
demos.description: Leverages LLM embeddings and automated transcription to generate personalized video highlights for students, improving engagement and tailoring content to individual learning profiles.

demos.title: PDF Text Comparison
demos.description: Provides side-by-side text comparison of two PDFs, quickly identifying content differences to streamline contract review, regulatory compliance checks, or editorial workflows.

demos.title: Personalized Decision Assistant
demos.description: Offers a multi-LLM conversational assistant with data and mind-map visualizations to guide strategic decision-making, reducing cognitive load on business leaders.

demos.title: Ratings Critical Data
demos.description: Automates extraction and analysis of key metrics from PDF reports, delivering structured insights and evidence to support governance, sustainability, or performance assessments.

demos.title: API Agent
demos.description: Allows usersto query APIs via natural language, surfacing real-time without technical integration overhead.

demos.title: Hypothesis Forge
demos.description: Automatically generates and statistically tests data hypotheses—returning success flags and p-values to accelerate data-driven experimentation and decision-making.

demos.title: Singapore Traffic Dashboard
demos.description: Delivers real­time traffic volume, congestion analytics, and anomaly detection across camera feeds to optimize urban mobility and infrastructure planning.

demos.title: Hospital Video Analytics
demos.description: Employs AI-powered computer vision for real-time anomaly detection in video feeds, enhancing patient safety and operational alerts in healthcare environments.

demos.title: AI Pipe
demos.description: Builds serverless LLM workflows using any OpenAI-compatible API.

demos.title: BSToast
demos.description: Tiny library offering Bootstrap toast notifications as a modern alert replacement.

demos.title: Decision Tree Builder
demos.description: Interactive tool to build and visualize decision trees in the browser.

demos.title: DTGen
demos.description: AI-assisted decision tree generator with advanced tree editing features.

demos.title: LinkedIn Apply Bot
demos.description: Bookmarklet automating LinkedIn 'Easy Apply' with live progress tracking.

demos.title: Model Discipline
demos.description: Benchmarks instruction-following compliance of LLMs across providers.

demos.title: MTEB Eval Dashboard
demos.description: Visualizes embedding model scores from the Massive Text Embedding Benchmark.

demos.title: Sentiment Analyzer
demos.description: Browser-based tool for sentiment and emotion analysis with charts.

demos.title: AddNotes Supabase
demos.description: Real-time notes app using Supabase auth and database.

demos.title: Data Quality Analyzer
demos.description: Analyzes spreadsheets in-browser using LLM-generated Python via Pyodide.

demos.title: PPT Generator
demos.description: Creates polished presentations from documents using AI-powered layouts.

demos.title: Carlinirepo Evaluator
demos.description: Interactive promptfoo tester for running evaluation suites.

demos.title: Decision Playbook
demos.description: Step-by-step visualizer for exploring decision tree playbooks.

demos.title: LLM Word Predictor
demos.description: Demonstrates language model fill-in-the-blank predictions with probabilities.

demos.title: Document Compliance Analyzer
demos.description: Checks uploaded PDFs against custom compliance queries via OpenRouter.
